name: Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol
Lore: 'BlasTech DL-44 heavy pistol. Short range, but relatively powerful. Carries energy for 25 shots. Illegal or restricted on most systems.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on Han, or 3 on your warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value. If hit by Han, target''s forfeit = 0.',
